title: Values
intro:
I value ridiculous laughs, tomfoolery, ballyhoo, attempting to frown while skipping, existential crises, type 2 fun, eco-friendly glitter, naked bike rides, ultimate frisbee, almond butter, expertly-roasted ‚Äòmallows, bunny ears, funkadelic tunes, shower thoughts, and stories of romance.

Pity for my bank account I also value human rights, equity, inclusivity, the environment, future generations, human connection, physical health, mental health, and minimalism.

ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

I understand that these views will disqualify me from most jobs - therefore causing me to 'earn' significantly less money than I otherwise would. I'm cool with that, though, being a filthy socialist Bernie supporter :)
